name: Unforeseeable Fate of Official Hynek: The Story About Census on Planet With Unknown Quantity of Wonderful Creatures
name_original: Unforeseeable Fate of Official Hynek: The Story About Census on Planet With Unknown Quantity of Wonderful Creatures
description:
Hynek is heading toward a distant planet to conduct a census of the population. He has to mark all the citizens with the stamp while obeying all the quick changing laws of the extraordinary society.

Our first try with 3D and HDRP and we think that we did kinda well!

  • WASD to move, SPACE to jump, LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to stamp
  • Created by Jakub Eremias, Jan Holan & Mikulas Hrdlicka under team pseudonym Census Galactica as an homage to our friends from Charles Games. Created during 48 hours as a part of GDS 2021 gamejam.
  • 10 levels included!
  • Alien citizens with tophats and variable behaviour based on context steering behaviour AI.
  • Cute animal noises, whales, guineapigs and camels. Also features traditional Javanese and Uighur music.
  • Attributions mentioned in-game. Free code inspiration taken from Brackeys and Dani tutorial videos.
  • Newest version here (https://drive.google.com/file/d/13PPCOWTvE-DgUQEyxslDCvnAn_jwWd9G/view?usp=shari...) but this is not a jam valid version as it was submitted after the deadline.
